narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tiny Feet & Heart Beats LLC is a Case Management provider based in Milwaukee, WI. From 2023-04 through 2023-10, this provider received $107K in Medicaid payments across 1K claims serving 241 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.7× the national median for T1016 (T1016), at $85 per claim vs. the median of $50, placing them above the 75th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in T1016 (T1016), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2023-10, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.
